      • backpropagate

        public void backpropagate(float learnEffect,
                          float[] inputData,
                          float[] outputData)
                   throws CoreNetException
        Backpropagates the network by the learn effect epsilon. DeltaWik = E * Di * ak
        Parameters:
        learnEffect - How much to adjust the weights (0..1)
        inputData - Input data trainings set
        outputData - Output should data trainings set
        Throws:
        CoreNetException

      • forwardPass

        public void forwardPass()
        Executes forward pass for the whole network with the setted input values. Outputed values of the neuron are only valid after this
